name: Kleabsil
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues influence; local Riveric loanwords
diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed, preserved shellfish
tide-day festivals tied to fishing calendar
craft traditions: net-weaving and tincture preparation
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steam megatechs
notes: accessible only to shallow-draft vessels; lends to isolation
local magistrate weak; real power lies with Harbor Guild and Syndicate
